commonRoomDescription: A modern, industrial-chic communal workspace or meeting room featuring a large, long wooden table at its center. The room has dark gray or black walls and an exposed ceiling with industrial-style lighting, including numerous bare Edison bulbs hanging at various lengths and some track lighting. Visible across multiple frames are tall, dark bookshelves filled with books, an area rug with a patterned design beneath the central table, and exposed metallic air ducts running along the ceiling. The table is consistently cluttered with multiple laptops, chargers, water bottles, coffee cups, snacks, and personal items, suggesting an active working environment. Various office chairs, some with a distinct brown leather and wood design, are arranged around the table. The overall aesthetic is functional yet stylish, with a somewhat unkempt but lived-in feel.

frames.description: This frame offers a direct view of the table's surface and the items on it from one end. The bookshelves on the left are visible, and the perspective on the windowed wall is frontal, with the patterned rug partially visible in the foreground.
frames.pov: A head-on view of the tabletop from one end, making the windowed wall central in the background, with the bookshelves still visible on the left.

frames.description: This frame is close to the table and shifted to the right. The books on the left are mostly out of frame, and more of the dark wall space to the right of the windows becomes visible.
frames.pov: Close to the table and shifted to the right, bringing more of the right-hand wall and less of the left bookshelves into view, with the windowed wall still prominent.

frames.description: This frame is closer to the end of the table, looking towards the whiteboard and into the background. A person is visible seated at a desk further back in the room, and another section of bookshelves or cabinets is on the far right.
frames.pov: Closer to the table and looking towards the far right end of the room, emphasizing the whiteboard and showing a person seated at a desk in the background. The perspective is now less about the full table length and more about the room's depth in this direction.

frames.description: This frame is even closer to the left side of the table, looking directly through the parted red curtains. More details of the adjacent area are visible, including people, additional seating, and a decorative fireplace. The table remains laden with laptops and drinks.
frames.pov: Moved closer to the table's left side, offering a clearer view through the parted red curtains into an adjacent brightly lit area with additional seating and people, making the table's items appear more in the foreground.

frames.description: The camera has pivoted significantly to the left, now looking along the length of the table towards the prominent bookshelves on the right wall. The red curtains are now visible only on the far left, and the multitude of laptops on the table is very clear.
frames.pov: Rotated further to the left, capturing the full length of the large wooden table from a lower angle and bringing the prominent bookshelves on the right into sharper focus, while the red curtains are now only partially visible on the far left.

frames.description: This is the whiteboard, a large dry-erase board mounted on the dark wall near the far end of the room. It carries remnants of brainstorming sessions — scribbled diagrams, sticky notes, and half-erased marker strokes, standing as a silent record of collaborative planning.
frames.pov: Looking directly at the whiteboard from a close vantage point, with the dark wall filling the background and the edge of the central table just barely visible below.

frames.description: This is the picture, a framed artwork or photograph hanging on the dark wall adjacent to the whiteboard. Its details are partially obscured by the room's moody lighting, but it adds a subtle decorative touch to the otherwise utilitarian workspace.
frames.pov: Facing the framed picture on the wall at roughly eye level, with the surrounding dark wall texture visible and the faint glow of Edison bulbs reflecting off the glass surface.

frames.description: This is the fire extinguisher, a bright red safety device mounted low on the wall near the entrance area. It contrasts sharply with the dark industrial aesthetic of the room, a practical necessity tucked into the workspace.
frames.pov: Looking down slightly at the fire extinguisher affixed to the wall, its vivid red cylinder standing out against the dark surroundings, with the floor and base of nearby furniture visible.

frames.description: This is the laptop, one of several open notebooks scattered across the long wooden table. Its screen glows softly amid the surrounding clutter of chargers, water bottles, and coffee cups — a focal point of the active working environment.
frames.pov: Looking down at the laptop on the table surface from a slightly elevated angle, with its illuminated screen visible alongside nearby cables, drink containers, and other personal items.

frames.description: This is the Dorrito packet, a crinkled snack bag sitting on the table among the laptops and drinks. Its bold, colorful packaging is a small splash of everyday life amid the workspace, hinting at long working sessions fueled by junk food.
frames.pov: A close-up view of the Dorrito packet resting on the wooden table surface, surrounded by nearby laptops, cables, and beverage containers, with the dark room stretching out behind.

frames.description: This is the studio light, a tall professional lighting fixture positioned towards the back of the room. Its adjustable head and sturdy tripod stand give the space a creative, production-ready feel alongside the industrial Edison bulbs overhead.
frames.pov: Looking towards the studio light standing in the deeper section of the room, its tall silhouette rising above the surrounding furniture, with the dark ceiling and exposed ductwork visible behind it.

frames.description: This is the bookshelf, a tall, dark shelving unit packed with books lining the wall. Its filled shelves add intellectual character to the industrial room, with spines of various colors and sizes creating an organic mosaic pattern.
frames.pov: Facing the bookshelf directly, capturing its full height from floor to near-ceiling, with rows of tightly packed books visible across multiple shelves and the dark wall framing it on either side.

frames.description: This is the window, part of the windowed wall covered by dark blinds. Slivers of natural light may peek through the edges, contrasting with the warm artificial glow of the Edison bulbs and track lighting inside the room.
frames.pov: Looking up slightly at the window on the wall, its dark blinds drawn shut, with the frame of the window visible and the faint outline of daylight seeping around the edges.

frames.description: This is the drums, a drum kit set up in a far corner of the space, well away from the central work table. Its presence adds a creative, eclectic character to the room — a reminder that this space serves more than just office work.
frames.pov: Looking across the room towards the distant drum kit tucked into the far corner, with cymbals and drum shells faintly visible past the clutter of the main workspace area.

frames.description: This is the chair with a jacket, an office chair draped with someone's jacket or hoodie left behind. It sits near the back of the room, giving the impression that its owner stepped away momentarily from a long working session.
frames.pov: Looking at the chair from a moderate distance, the jacket hanging loosely over the backrest, with the dark floor and nearby furniture providing context to its position in the room.

frames.description: This is the chair near the curtain, positioned close to the large opening framed by vibrant red curtains that separate this room from the adjacent area. The chair sits slightly apart from the main table, as if placed for a quick conversation or observation.
frames.pov: Looking at the chair situated near the red curtains, with the draped fabric visible just beyond and the glow from the adjacent space casting a faint light on the chair's surface.
